adjective.description: Relating to chemistry, or the interactions of substances as studied in chemistry.
examples: the chemical composition of the atmosphere

noun.description: A compound or substance that has been purified or prepared, especially artificially.
examples: never mix disinfectant with other chemicals
controversy arose over treatment of apples with this chemical

origin: Late 16th century: from French chimique or modern Latin chimicus, chymicus, from medieval Latin alchymicus, from alchimia (see alchemy).
